name: GlocusentBabyLight
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: baby light
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Glocusent Baby Light is a smart sleep app that lets you easily control your Glocusent devices, the N11 Baby Light and N12 Starry Light.

With the N11 Baby Light, your baby can enjoy calm, comfortable, and high-quality sleep, making every night enjoyable for both you and your little one. This all-in-one device encompasses everything needed for quality sleep, including:

-Video Monitoring: Keep an eye on your baby anytime, and capture precious moments with photo and video recording.
-Video Calling: Enjoy high-quality video calls for real-time interaction with your baby.
-Sleep Scheduling: Customize your baby's sleep and wake times, helping them develop healthy sleep habits.
-Lights and Light Effects: Explore soothing light and effect combinations to create a calming atmosphere.
-Cry Detection: Receive alerts on your phone when your baby cries.
-Sleep Sounds: Discover a variety of audio options to help your baby sleep better, from white noise to lullabies.
-Sleep Calculator: Calculate your baby's ideal sleep times and durations based on scientific research."
